verbs.description: In readers ' letters : [ARG1: Trump] [V: is] [ARG2: on a quixotic quest for a Nobel Peace Prize] , and Kim Jong Un just wants sanctions relief and to stave off a military attack .
In readers ' letters : Trump is on a quixotic quest for a Nobel Peace Prize , and [ARG0: Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-ADV: just] [V: wants] [ARG1: sanctions relief and to stave off a military attack] .
In readers ' letters : Trump is on a quixotic quest for a Nobel Peace Prize , and [ARG0: Kim Jong Un] [ARGM-ADV: just] wants sanctions relief and to [V: stave] off [ARG1: a military attack] .
